actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United Support of Artists for Africa be commended for its efforts to aid the victims of the spreading African famine.

summary.text: States that the United Support of Artists for Africa should be commended for aiding the African famine victims and for demonstrating that people can make a difference in relieving the plight of those victims.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United Support of Artists for Africa be commended for its efforts to aid the victims of the spreading African famine.
